TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CorrelationScope extends System.Activities.NativeActivity

Docs.summary: Provides implicit management for child messaging activities.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope> activity maintains an implicit <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle> that is only visible to child activities. When the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope.CorrelatesWith%2A> property is set by the user, it will be used as the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope> implicit handle. In the case of nested <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope>, children of the inner scope cannot access implicit handle of the outer scope.
## Examples The following example shows how to create a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope>. This example creates a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Sequence> and adds a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope> (among other activites). The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope> contains a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Sequence> that is composed of a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Send> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveReply> activity.
[!code-csharp[ContentBasedCorrelation#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/contentbasedcorrelation/cs/client.cs#3)]

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the used by the child messaging activities.
Docs.value: The correlation handle used by the child messaging activities.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This property is read-only at runtime. If the value is set at runtime, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
The runtime uses the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationInitializer.CorrelationHandle%2A> for correlation if it is present, otherwise the **CorrelatesWith** property of the messaging activity will be used. If both are absent, the ambient handle provided by <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope> or the workflow service is used.
